member.name: T:MsalAuthInMauiBlazor.MsalClient.PCAWrapper
member.summary: This is a wrapper for PCA. It is singleton and can be utilized by both application and the MAM callback

member.name: M:MsalAuthInMauiBlazor.MsalClient.PCAWrapper.AcquireTokenSilentAsync(System.String[])
member.param: desired scopes

member.name: M:MsalAuthInMauiBlazor.MsalClient.PCAWrapper.AcquireTokenInteractiveAsync(System.String[])
member.summary: Perform the interactive acquisition of the token for the given scope
member.param: desired scopes

member.name: M:MsalAuthInMauiBlazor.MsalClient.PCAWrapper.SignOutAsync
member.summary: Sign out may not perform the complete sign out as company portal may hold the token.

member.name: M:MsalAuthInMauiBlazor.MainActivity.OnActivityResult(System.Int32,Android.App.Result,Android.Content.Intent)
member.summary: This is a callback to continue with the authentication Info about redirect URI: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/develop/msal-client-application-configuration#redirect-uri
member.param: request code
result code
intent of the actvity

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ColorAnimationExtensions_Button.TextColorTo(Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Button,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,Microsoft.Maui.Easing,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Animates the TextColor of an to the given color
member.param: The target color to animate the to
The time, in milliseconds, between the frames of the animation
The duration, in milliseconds, of the animation
The easing function to be used in the animation
member.returns: Value indicating if the animation completed successfully or not
